description: This table contains Home Health verbal orders components information. This information is used to track changes made to verbal orders on the Home Health Remote Client.

columns.name: VERBAL_ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the verbal order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: COMPON_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Verbal orders component type.  Links to category table ZC_COMP_TYPE.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Other


Medication


Intervention


Visit


Plan of Care


DME


Admit


Hospice Plan Of Care


Certificate of Terminal Illness


Hospice Face to Face Attestation


Home Health Face to Face Attestation


Code Status

columns.name: COMPON_OLD_MED_ID
columns.description: Old medication verbal order ID.  Links to table ORDER_PROC.

columns.name: COMPON_VST_DISC_C_NAME
columns.description:
Verbal order component visit discipline.  Links to category table ZC_COMPON_VST_DISC.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: COMPON_OLD_FREQ
columns.description: Verbal order component old visit frequency.

columns.name: COMPON_NEW_FREQ
columns.description: Verbal order component new visit frequency.

columns.name: COMPON_EPS_CARE_ID
columns.description: Verbal order component episode of care ID.  Links to EPISODE table.

columns.name: COMPON_LINK_COMP
columns.description: Verbal order component linked component.  This item is used to store the link to the components for which this verbal order component is created.

columns.name: COMP_PENDING_FAX_YN
columns.description:
This item stores whether the verbal order component  has been pended.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: COMPON_TAKING_DIFF_LINE
columns.description: This item stores the pointer to the patient taking differently line associated with a Home Health medication verbal order, if it exists.

columns.name: DISCON_MED_TEXT
columns.description: Additional information on why an order's medication is discontinued.

columns.name: MED_AUDIT_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the medication audit trail. This is the line number found in column LINE of AUDIT_ORD_RXNOADD.

columns.name: SUPPL_ORDER_NOT_SENT_ALL_YN
columns.description:
Whether the order has been sent to all the providers who should be notified of changes to the plan of care.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes
